d.f: `舊時~`妻子~`對~`自己~`的~`丈夫~`的~`敬稱~。

e: 例⃝「`這~`位~`相公~`氣宇軒昂~，`想必~`出身~`不凡~」。
d.f: `舊時~`對~`讀書人~`或~`成年~`男子~`的~`敬稱~。

francais: joueur de mahjong disqualifié par inadvertance
English: mahjong player disqualified by unintentionally taking in the wrong number of dominoes
(old form of address for one's husband) husband
